Name: dta_snow_water_equivalent
Title: Snow Water Equivalent (SWE)
Description: Snow Water Equivalent, in mm, represents the depth of water that would result if the snow mass melted completely ([Fierz et al., 2009](https://unesdoc.unesco.org/ark:/48223/pf0000186462)). Generated daily based on the distributed full energy balance physical model GEOtop ([Endrizzi et al., 2014](https://gmd.copernicus.org/articles/7/2831/2014/gmd-7-2831-2014.html)).
